body:
TJ: “Cyr-”

Cyrus: “I do.”

TJ: “You didn’t let me fin-”

Cyrus: “I, DO!”

TJ: “So you’re up for a hike?”

Cyrus: “Oh. Suddenly I don’t.”

summary: begin again (a wandi drabble)
title: begin again (a wandi drabble)
body:
Andi couldn’t remember the last word she said to Walker Brodsky. She’d see him around sometimes, and maybe he would wave, but most often he wouldn’t. She didn’t blame him, given that she basically cut him out of her life twice. A well meaning cut out but a cut off nevertheless. A crush-a whatever they were wasn’t worth losing her friendship with Buffy. Surely, he knew that.

Didn’t he?

But now Buffy was with Marty. Cyrus with TJ. Heck, even Jonah found a new girlfriend with this hard of hearing, sweet, bubbly blonde haired girl. Andi could barely remember the name of the girl though. Bex and Bowie were getting married. It was like all the loose ends of her life were tied, and all there was left was one question. What if?

So, then Andi headed out to the flea market to do what she’d done millions of times before. Find new materials to make new crafts. She needed a distraction.

Anything to stop her from thinking about-

“Hey, Walker,” she said as she noticed him in the crowd.

He turned around slowly, smiling weakly. “Oh, hey Andi.”

She’d forgotten what his genuine smile looked like.

“Are you looking for anything in particular?”

“Not really,” Walker shrugged.

“Did you hear that my parents are getting married?” Andi asked, hoping to get a more energized response.

“Oh, cool. What theme are they going for?”

“This outside floral thing. Bex didn’t want to make a big deal out of the wedding, but I convinced her to do it. The funny thing is that I had this dream about Jo-”

She saw what little interest Walker had leave his eyes.

“Well the actual bulk of the dream doesn’t matter. But the design of the wedding was BEAUTIFUL, and I vowed to myself that I had to recreate it. What good is imagination if you waste it?”

Walker smiled. “Yeah, you’re right.”

“I sent you an invitation but you never responded. You could still come you know,” Andi prodded.

Walker stepped back. “I don’t want to intrude and I don’t think that’s a good idea.”

Andi closed the distance between them. “Buffy’s with Marty, so it won’t be awkward. If anything he was the ex when you guys were dating, so no awkwardness. And besides, you could be my-”

“I could be your what, Andi? What even are we? Did we ever define it? I’m not allowed to initate contact with you but we’re still friends,” Walker’s smile faded.

Andi couldn’t tell whether to respond with a joke or tell the truth. She hesitated.

“Andi-”

“No, you’re right. I wasn’t fair to you. And honestly, I had a lot of pressure put on me but that doesn’t make it right,” Andi laughed to herself. “I chose Jonah but still acted like I had claim over you. And I tried to be okay with you and Buffy dating when I wasn’t. And then I just wanted the two of you to be happy so whenever you made plans I just… I just said something came up. Nothing came up Walker. And now… now…”

Andi felt like crying. And now I still like you.

“Whoa, whoa, it’s okay. I’m not mad. Andi… Andi… breathe.”

“And now, I still like you. I liked you way more than I liked Jonah-but since everyone.. I mean everyone. Did you know that Cyrus liked Jonah? And then there was a time that we thought Buffy liked Jonah. And bex and bowie are always acting like we’re the mini mes of them. Me and Jonah. Ha, like we would ever get married.”

Andi felt the tear work its way down her face. Then, she felt Walker swipe it away.

“Andi. It’s fine.”

“It’s not though. My world was spinning so I made all these bad decisions and no one held me accountable and now that it’s stopped, I’m looking back and reflecting and… I’m sorry.”

Now, Walker didn’t know what to say. Andi was right.

“I accept your apology, but I can’t go to the wedding.”

“Why not?”

“I’m actually out of town that weekend, but I’m free to hang out some other time. If you want to actually talk about it.”

Andi half smiled.

“And if you’re free today to bum around the flea market and maybe get a milkshake or something?”

Andi nodded.

Walker noticed a nearby booth. “Cashews?”

“Cashews.”

Andi nodded.

Walker noticed a nearby booth. “Cashews?”

“Cashews.”

blog.name: tyrusmagocious
blog.title: Father, The Son, & The Holy Tyrus
blog.description: We stan because we can.

summary: Gums n Kisses
body:
Gums n Kisses

Buffy: * chewing gum*

Cyrus: “Buffy, Can I have 1 pls. I forgot to brush my teeth. I was in a rush”

Buffy: *gives him one and watch him put it in his mouth*

Cyrus: “Thankssss! You’re a life saver!”

Buffy: “I’ll be back.” *flew the scene*

…

TJ: *enters* “Hey underdog”

TJ and Cyrus starts kissin and all that cute shit cus he’s with him.

TJ: *chewing cyrus’ gum* “nice flavor.”

Buffy: *enters*

Buffy: *notices TJ chewing* “where did u get your gum?”

TJ: “I got it from Cyrus. Why?”

Buffy: *slowly turns to cyrus, he awkwardly smiles.* “know what, I don’t want to know how it happened.”

blog.name: martydriscoll
blog.title: Andi Mack? More Like Stan-di Mack.
blog.description: We all know Marty is gonna take Buffy’s last name (and not just because he doesn’t have a last name himself).

summary:
Day 28. What are the characters favorite candy?
Andi - Mystery Flavored Jelly Beans because she never knows what to expect!...
body:
Day 28. What are the characters favorite candy?

Andi - Mystery Flavored Jelly Beans because she never knows what to expect!

Buffy - Sour Warheads. When they were kids, eating them was a competition of sorts, but now, she actually really likes the flavor, especially since she’s used to the sour by now.

Cyrus - Butterfingers. He told Buffy that he “is glad that he found a candy as clumsy as him!”

Jonah - Snickers. Idk if you’ve ever seen Jonah when he’s hungry, but he’s literally like the commercials. It’s the only time he’s not the happy-go-lucky dofus we all know and love.

Bowie - Laffy Taffy. He doesn’t know why, he’s just always had a sweet tooth for them.

Bex - Andi let her try one of those Airhead Xtremes and she’s been hooked ever since. She doesn’t know what is in those things (and doesn’t want to know), but she is thankful that they exist.

CeCe - Don’t ever tell anyone I told you this, but she’s a sucker for Dove Chocolate. She’s really more of a dark chocolate gal, though. Ham knows all of this and is sure to buy her some every now and then to surprise her, especially on particularly hard days. The week Andi moved out, it was like a chocolate factory at their house.

Ham - Abba-Zabbas were his absolute favorite and it is an outrage to him that they were discontinued!

Amber - Sour Patch Kids (first they’re sour, then they’re sweet…sound familiar?)

TJ - Baby Ruths. Not only is TJ a basketball stan, he absolutely loves baseball and those candy bars. When he was a kid, his mom used to let him get a pack of baseball cards and a Baby Ruth every time they went to the store. Amber was allowed to get a pack of her favorite candy, Sour Patch Kids, and whatever small you her heart desired that day too. Cyrus doesn’t have the heart to tell TJ that the company claims to not have any affiliation with the baseball player, but then again, they probably just said that to get out of paying him royalties, so who knows?

Walker - Mystery Flavored Airheads. He isn’t a fan of the bland absence of color, but he loves that the flavor changes from batch to batch. He never knows exactly what he’s gonna get, but he absolutely loves that about it.

Iris - Smarties. Her mom used to tell her that the more she ate, the smarter she would be, and while she hasn’t found any evidence supporting her mother’s claims, she hasn’t found any supporting the contrary either 🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️

Marty - Starbursts. He says the burst of flavor is “like a party in his mouth.”

Gus - Gushers because they literally have his name written all over it (and he thinks the juice is really cool).

Natalie - 100 Grand Bars because she’s knows her worth 🤑🤑

Jonah - Snickers. Idk if you’ve ever seen Jonah when he’s hungry, but he’s literally like the commercials. It’s the only time he’s not the happy-go-lucky dofus we all know and love.

Bowie - Laffy Taffy. He doesn’t know why, he’s just always had a sweet tooth for them.

Bex - Andi let her try one of those Airhead Xtremes and she’s been hooked ever since. She doesn’t know what is in those things (and doesn’t want to know), but she is thankful that they exist.

CeCe - Don’t ever tell anyone I told you this, but she’s a sucker for Dove Chocolate. She’s really more of a dark chocolate gal, though. Ham knows all of this and is sure to buy her some every now and then to surprise her, especially on particularly hard days. The week Andi moved out, it was like a chocolate factory at their house.

Ham - Abba-Zabbas were his absolute favorite and it is an outrage to him that they were discontinued!

Amber - Sour Patch Kids (first they’re sour, then they’re sweet…sound familiar?)

TJ - Baby Ruths. Not only is TJ a basketball stan, he absolutely loves baseball and those candy bars. When he was a kid, his mom used to let him get a pack of baseball cards and a Baby Ruth every time they went to the store. Amber was allowed to get a pack of her favorite candy, Sour Patch Kids, and whatever small you her heart desired that day too. Cyrus doesn’t have the heart to tell TJ that the company claims to not have any affiliation with the baseball player, but then again, they probably just said that to get out of paying him royalties, so who knows?

Walker - Mystery Flavored Airheads. He isn’t a fan of the bland absence of color, but he loves that the flavor changes from batch to batch. He never knows exactly what he’s gonna get, but he absolutely loves that about it.

Iris - Smarties. Her mom used to tell her that the more she ate, the smarter she would be, and while she hasn’t found any evidence supporting her mother’s claims, she hasn’t found any supporting the contrary either 🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️

Marty - Starbursts. He says the burst of flavor is “like a party in his mouth.”

Gus - Gushers because they literally have his name written all over it (and he thinks the juice is really cool).

Natalie - 100 Grand Bars because she’s knows her worth 🤑🤑
trail.content:
Day 28. What are the characters favorite candy?

Andi - Mystery Flavored Jelly Beans because she never knows what to expect!

Buffy - Sour Warheads. When they were kids, eating them was a competition of sorts, but now, she actually really likes the flavor, especially since she’s used to the sour by now.

Cyrus - Butterfingers. He told Buffy that he “is glad that he found a candy as clumsy as him!”

Jonah - Snickers. Idk if you’ve ever seen Jonah when he’s hungry, but he’s literally like the commercials. It’s the only time he’s not the happy-go-lucky dofus we all know and love.

Bowie - Laffy Taffy. He doesn’t know why, he’s just always had a sweet tooth for them.

Bex - Andi let her try one of those Airhead Xtremes and she’s been hooked ever since. She doesn’t know what is in those things (and doesn’t want to know), but she is thankful that they exist.

CeCe - Don’t ever tell anyone I told you this, but she’s a sucker for Dove Chocolate. She’s really more of a dark chocolate gal, though. Ham knows all of this and is sure to buy her some every now and then to surprise her, especially on particularly hard days. The week Andi moved out, it was like a chocolate factory at their house.

Ham - Abba-Zabbas were his absolute favorite and it is an outrage to him that they were discontinued!

Amber - Sour Patch Kids (first they’re sour, then they’re sweet…sound familiar?)

TJ - Baby Ruths. Not only is TJ a basketball stan, he absolutely loves baseball and those candy bars. When he was a kid, his mom used to let him get a pack of baseball cards and a Baby Ruth every time they went to the store. Amber was allowed to get a pack of her favorite candy, Sour Patch Kids, and whatever small you her heart desired that day too. Cyrus doesn’t have the heart to tell TJ that the company claims to not have any affiliation with the baseball player, but then again, they probably just said that to get out of paying him royalties, so who knows?

Walker - Mystery Flavored Airheads. He isn’t a fan of the bland absence of color, but he loves that the flavor changes from batch to batch. He never knows exactly what he’s gonna get, but he absolutely loves that about it.

Iris - Smarties. Her mom used to tell her that the more she ate, the smarter she would be, and while she hasn’t found any evidence supporting her mother’s claims, she hasn’t found any supporting the contrary either 🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️

Marty - Starbursts. He says the burst of flavor is “like a party in his mouth.”

Gus - Gushers because they literally have his name written all over it (and he thinks the juice is really cool).

Natalie - 100 Grand Bars because she’s knows her worth 🤑🤑

blog.name: youknowwhatelseyouare
blog.title: Tyrus Is Canon You Can't Change My Mind
blog.description: Andi Mack sideblog | Tyrus | AR | she/her | 20 years young | uhhhh not straight | feel free to message!

summary: 3 with Tyrus
question: 3 with Tyrus
answer:
“I’ll never stop telling you you’re beautiful.” TJ murmured, running his fingers through Cyrus’s hair.


Cyrus snuggled up closer to TJ.


“What about when I’m old and soggy and gross?”


TJ chuckled.


“‘Soggy’?”


“Whatever.”


TJ leaned down and kissed Cyrus’s head. Cyrus smiled, his eyes closing.


“I love you, Cyrus Goodman,” TJ whispered as the TV light flickered and his boyfriend fell asleep.

blog.title: Tyrus Is Canon You Can't Change My Mind
blog.description: Andi Mack sideblog | Tyrus | AR | she/her | 20 years young | uhhhh not straight | feel free to message!

summary: 9 and wonah???
question: 9 and wonah???
answer:
“I’m so stupid, I keep messing things up, I don’t even know why you’re still with me I-“ Jonah said.


He couldn’t stop shaking. It didn’t matter how many therapists he saw, or what medications he took, they could never stop the panic attacks from happening. Who was he kidding? Walker wouldn’t want to stay with someone who was an anxious wreck.


“Hey, I love you, you know that?” Walker said, reaching over to place a hand on Jonah’s arm.


Jonah looked up.


“You…love me?” He said, staring into Walker’s eyes.


“I do. I- I know we’ve only been dating for a few months but I- I’ve never felt this strongly about anyone before.”


“Me neither,” Jonah admitted.


“I know things seem hopeless right now, but know that I’m here for you, and I’m not going anywhere.”


“Really?”


“Really.”


Walker wrapped Jonah in a hug, and Jonah felt tears welling up in his eyes. What had he done to deserve such an amazing boyfriend?
